name: Hydro Samachurl
desc:
A wizened, mumbling hilichurl, one that chants of the power of Hydro.
Hilichurls especially gifted in commanding the elements who often reach the zenith of their skill in their twilight years. What sort of life would lead to such simple creatures being able to summon water and rains?

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Divining Scroll
dropMaterial.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

dropMaterial.name: Sealed Scroll
dropMaterial.desc: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

dropMaterial.name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
dropMaterial.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

dropMaterial.name: Damaged Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

dropMaterial.name: Stained Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

dropMaterial.name: Ominous Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.
